msg_field_trade_system_01:
Esse Pokémon não atende às condições
de troca!
msg_field_trade_a_01:
Você tem o Pokémon Flabébé? Eles podem
levar flores de cores diferentes, certo?\c
Poderia trocar um Flabébé pelo meu Snom?
Qualquer cor de flor está bem para mim!
msg_field_trade_a_03: Ai, que pena! Bom, me avise se mudar de ideia!
msg_field_trade_a_04:
Nossa, é tão pequenino... Tão fofinho... O jeito
que monta na flor é simplesmente... Mmm!\c
... Ufa. Snom também é adorável, então cuide bem dele, ok?
msg_field_trade_a_05:
Flabébé é tão fofo! Talvez eu pegue todos os
Flabébé de cores diferentes!
msg_field_trade_a_06:
You can’t trade if you only have one Pokémon!\c
Come back when you have at least two Pokémon
on your team!
msg_field_trade_b_01:
Is it true that Wooper in Paldea are venomous?\c
I have a blue Wooper I caught in another region.
Wanna trade a Paldean Wooper to get it?
msg_field_trade_b_02:
Wow, that Wooper’s got a dark color...
You sure you’re OK to trade?
msg_field_trade_b_03:
Let me know if you change your mind and want
to have a Wooper trade-off!
msg_field_trade_b_04:
Wow, it really does have the Poison type!
That’s so cool!\c
The blue Wooper’s neat too, so make sure you
give it lots of attention, OK?
msg_field_trade_b_05:
Oooh, its eyes get droopy when they’re closed!
Paldean Wooper is SO cute!\c
It’s neat that the same Pokémon, depending on
the region, can have different looks and types!
msg_field_trade_b_06:
Oh, but you only have one Pokémon!\c
You need to have at least two Pokémon on your
team if you want to trade!
msg_field_trade_c_01:
I don’t have a Pokémon that I can ride on water,
but I want to meet some lovely sea Pokémon!\c
If you have a Pincurchin, would you be willing to
trade it for my Haunter?
msg_field_trade_c_02: You’re OK with trading that Pincurchin?
msg_field_trade_c_03:
Aww, you don’t want to trade? Sometimes you
gotta make bold decisions in life, you know?
msg_field_trade_c_04:
Oh my! My darling Hauntikins evolved into
Gengar?!\c
I’d heard rumors about Pokémon that evolve
when they’re traded!
msg_field_trade_c_05:
How’s dear Hauntikins doing? The Pincurchin
you gave me is just electrifying!
msg_field_trade_c_06:
You can’t do a trade if you only have one
Pokémon on your team!\c
I think you should come back when you have
at least two!
